Name: Faience shabti
Description: A small, glazed faience shabti with details painted in black. The figure carries two moulded and painted hoes and a small basket, now faded, thrown over the left shoulder. The eyes are black and the plain wig is decorated with a simple seshed-headband which is tied at the back. The text is on the front of the body in a single line without borders. The back of the shabti is flat.
